price: 7. Moto oyo asalaki bolamu moke lokola mbuma zelo akomona yango.
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
